item.title: Report X-2025011291
item.description:
Report X-2025011291

Identified by scraper @ 2025-02-01T00:52:02+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-25
  • City: GOODYEAR
  • State: AZ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RECIEVED A CALL FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE. UPON ARRIVAL IDENTIFIED THE LEAKING PACKAGE AND CONTAMINATED. DISCOVERED THAT THE LEAKING PACKAGE WAS A HAZMAT PACKAGE. PLACED HAZMAT AND CONTAMINATED IN SPILL TRAY. TRANSPORTED TO DMP AREA FOR PROPER DISPOSAL
